channel.title: An essayist who learns from a film director who is inspired by comic books
channel.description:
https://youtu.be/pij5lihbC6k
@teodor.mechev I thought you'd like this. Not only is it a fun deconstruction of editing, it made me think about all the different sources of inspiration we have to explore.

This is pretty cool, and yes, I’m familiar with such influencial video practices.
